name: Experimental Approaches in Drug Discovery
description: Lecturers use their own research to demonstrate how they approach a biological question. The lectures emphasize why one approach is chosen over other possible approaches, and explain the strengths and limitations of techniques. Following the one-hour lecture there is an interactive discussion of the experimental approach covered in the lecture.
prerequisites: One of PSL300H1/PSL301H1/BIO270H1/BIO271H1, and completion of at least 10.0 FCE, or permission of Department
